org.forum.api.commons

Class ErrorUtility

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forum.api.commons.ErrorUtility

  • public class ErrorUtility
extends java.lang.Object
    Error management utility class with static methods to provide support for error conditions checks, render correctly formed error messages transfer object when exception is thrown and define correct formed error message for different types of exceptions thrown.
    Author:
    Murad Bakhshaliyev

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ErrorUtility() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ErrorMessageSingle> generateErrorMessage(java.lang.String message, org.springframework.http.HttpStatus httpStatus)
      Return correct message based on ErrorMessageSingle data model in a response entity for cases when error message is represented by string.
      static org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ErrorMessageMultiple> generateErrorMessageMap(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> messageMap, org.springframework.http.HttpStatus httpStatus)
      Return correct message on ErrorMessageMultiple data model in a response entity for cases when error message is represented by map.
      static java.lang.String getDataNotFoundExceptionMessage(java.lang.Long id)
      Gets corresponding error message to pass to custom DataNotFoundException when it is thrown.
      static java.lang.String getMismatchExceptionMessage(java.lang.String field, java.lang.String datatype)
      Gets the mismatch exception message.
      static void isEmptyFields(Message message)
      Checks if fields of specified Message model object are empty, if so throw custom EmptyInputException with corresponding error message represented by map.

    • Method Detail

      • isEmptyFields

        public static void isEmptyFields(Message message)
                          throws EmptyInputException
        Checks if fields of specified Message model object are empty, if so throw custom EmptyInputException with corresponding error message represented by map.
        Parameters:
        message - Message object to check fields
        Throws:
        EmptyInputException - if one of the fields is empty

      • getDataNotFoundExceptionMessage

        public static java.lang.String getDataNotFoundExceptionMessage(java.lang.Long id)
        Gets corresponding error message to pass to custom DataNotFoundException when it is thrown.
        Parameters:
        id - id for error message text formation
        Returns:
        error message for exception

      • getMismatchExceptionMessage

        public static java.lang.String getMismatchExceptionMessage(java.lang.String field,
                                                           java.lang.String datatype)
        Gets the mismatch exception message.
        Parameters:
        field - incorrect field for error message text formation
        datatype - datatype that is required for error message text formation
        Returns:
        error message for exception

      • generateErrorMessage

        public static org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ErrorMessageSingle> generateErrorMessage(java.lang.String message,
                                                                                               org.springframework.http.HttpStatus httpStatus)
        Return correct message based on ErrorMessageSingle data model in a response entity for cases when error message is represented by string.
        Parameters:
        message - error message string
        httpStatus - HTTP status
        Returns:
        response entity with correctly formed error message transfer object

      • generateErrorMessageMap

        public static org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ErrorMessageMultiple> generateErrorMessageMap(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> messageMap,
                                                                                                    org.springframework.http.HttpStatus httpStatus)
        Return correct message on ErrorMessageMultiple data model in a response entity for cases when error message is represented by map.
        Parameters:
        messageMap - error message map
        httpStatus - HTTP status
        Returns:
        response entity with correctly formed error message transfer object
